```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("rmd_config.R")
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```

dette er index.rmd


```{r læsfiler}
json_files <- list.files(path = "data/", full.names = T)
```

første forsøg på et kort!

```{r kort}
json_files %>% map_dfr(fromJSON) %>% 
  select(name, coordinates) %>% 
  unnest(c(name, coordinates)) %>% 
  unnest(c(lat, lon)) %>% 
  mutate(lat = lat + .01,
         lng = lon + 0.01) %>% 
  select(lat, lng) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers()

```
